DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate flexible doses (5-30 mg) of aripiprazole in patients with bipolar depression.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Aripiprazole in Patients With Bipolar I Disorder With a Major Depressive Episode
DOC.criteria: Outpatients Must sign informed consent prior to protocolrelated procedures Women who are pregnant, trying to become pregnant, or nursing Significant risk of committing suicide Any serious unstable medical conditions
DOC.keyword: Bipolar I disorder with major depressive episode
